title: Memphis
description: The AJE Authority investigates crimes against supernatural's. The Old McDonald farm has been on their radar for ten years. It's time to shut them down. Ciaran doesn't know any different. He was born an omega into the Old McDonald breeding facility. Worse than that, he was born a non shifting omega. The lowest of the low. He was the whipping boy. He long gave up on someone saving him. Everyday is pain and the acceptance that his life will never be anything more than misery. Memphis is the head of the shifter unit for the AJE Authority. When his boss Kade calls him and his team in to go undercover for a very important case, Memphis never expects to find his mate. It wasn't that he didn't want a mate, he just never believed it was going to be part of his lot. However, will his mate accept him or will their lives that have been lived so differently get in the way?
author: S.L. Davies
